text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

I think one's purpose
in life is to be happy.

To me, happiness is a direct
outcome of serving others.

When my mom came to the
US and was struggling,

there were many individuals
that, through selfless acts,
helped her succeed.

I will be forever
thankful to them.

In order to serve
and be happy, I

want to replicate what these
individuals did for my family,
but at scale.

I want to work to enable
access to education, mentoring,

support to disenfranchised
communities in Colombia,
the US, and the world.

As an MS/MBA
joint-degree student,

I think the best way to do
so is through technology
and entrepreneurship.

So I will use technology to
improve the life of people,

to enable economic development,
and access to opportunities.

Ultimately, my purpose in
life is to use technology
to help create a better world.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
